#onetrust-banner-sdk
{
    padding: 1rem;
	margin: .2rem !important;
}

/* Adding padding to the preferences heading to center it*/
h2#ot-pc-title{
	padding: 1rem 0 !important;
}

/* 
	IMAGES STYLES START
*/
/* Adjusting the logo to align with description */
div#onetrust-banner-sdk.ot-bnr-w-logo img.ot-bnr-logo
{
    position: absolute;
    top: 50px !important;
    transform: translate(-5%);
    left: 0px;
	width: 50px !important;
    height: 50px !important;
    margin: .5rem
}
/* Hiding OneTrust logos from banner and preference modal */
div.ot-pc-footer-logo, div.ot-pc-logo
{
    display: none !important;
    visibility: hidden !important;
    width: 0 !important;
    height: 0 !important;
}
/*
	IMAGES STYLES END
*/

/*
	TITLE AND DESCRIPTION STYLES START
*/
/* Adding color to the banner title above description */
h2#onetrust-policy-title
{
    color: #002c77 !important
}
/* Adjusting padding to banner description */
div#onetrust-policy-text
{
    font-size: 14px !important
}
/* Adjusnto margin left to title and description */
#onetrust-policy-text, #onetrust-policy-title  
{
    margin-left: .5rem !important;
}
/*
	TITLE AND DESCRIPTION STYLES END
*/

/* 
	BUTTONS AND LINKS STYLES START
*/
/* Banner link style */
#onetrust-policy-text a.ot-cookie-policy-link
{
    margin-left: 0.25rem !important;
    text-decoration: underline !important;
}
/* Adding underline to links default style */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler.cookie-setting-link, a.privacy-notice-link
{
   text-decoration: underline !important;
}
/* Adjunsting links hover style */
div#onetrust-policy-text a:hover, a.privacy-notice-link:hover, #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler.cookie-setting-link:hover 
{
    text-decoration: none !important;
    color: #006dc7 !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
}
/* Adjusting buttons hover style */
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-accept-btn-handler:hover, #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-reject-all-handler:hover, #accept-recommended-btn-handler:hover, button.save-preference-btn-handler:hover
{
    background-color: #002c77 !important;
    text-decoration: underline !important;
    opacity: 1 !important
}
/* Removing opacity from buttons on hover */
#onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-sdk-button:hover, #onetrust-banner-sdk :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):hover, #onetrust-banner-sdk :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):focus, #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-sdk-button:hover, #onetrust-pc-sdk :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):hover, #onetrust-pc-sdk :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):focus, #ot-sdk-cookie-policy .ot-sdk-button:hover, #ot-sdk-cookie-policy :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):hover, #ot-sdk-cookie-policy :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):focus
{
   opacity: 1 !important
}
/* Buttons focus style adding outline offset for the preferences modal and banner to be more visible */
/* Preference center tabs focus */
div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk *:focus{
	outline-offset: -2px !important;
	outline: 2px solid #002c77 !important;
}
div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-vlst-cntr > a:focus, div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk a.privacy-notice-link:focus, div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk button.save-preference-btn-handler:focus, div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk button#accept-recommended-btn-handler:focus
{
	outline: 2px solid #002c77 !important;		
	outline-offset: 1px !important;
}
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-banner-sdk *:focus, #onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-banner-sdk:focus
{
	outline-width: 2px !important;
}

/* 
	TOGGLES STYLES START
*/

class="ot-tab-desc ot-sdk-eight ot-sdk-columns"><div class="ot-desc-cntr" id="ot-tab-desc" tabindex="0" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="ot-pvcy-hdr"><h4 id="ot-pvcy-hdr">Your Privacy</h4><p id="ot-pc-desc" class="ot-grp-desc">When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, primarily in the form of cookies. This information might pertain to you, your preferences, or your device and is generally used to ensure the site functions as expected. While this information typically does not identify you directly, it can provide a more personalized web experience. 

We respect your right to privacy. Therefore, you have the option to not allow certain types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to learn more and adjust our default settings. Please note, however, that blocking some types of cookies may affect your site experience and the services we can offer. 
            <br><a href="https://it.johnshopkins.edu/policies-privacystatement/" class="privacy-notice-link" rel="noopener" target="_blank" aria-label="Privacy Statement, opens in a new tab">Privacy Statement</a></p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0001"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Strictly Necessary Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. This category may contain some cookie types that are unable to be removed from our application.</p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0002"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Website Traffic Measurement</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0002" id="ot-group-id-C0002" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0002" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0002"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0002"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Website Traffic Measurement</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. These cookies may also allow us to determine how you arrived at our site. These cookies are non-essential, but without these cookies our ability to monitor site performance is impacted. </p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0003"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Functional/Performance Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0003" id="ot-group-id-C0003" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0003" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0003"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0003"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Functional/Performance Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies enable our website to provide enhanced functionality and performance. They may remember choices you make, such as language preferences or region selection, and provide more tailored features. These cookies may be set by us or third-party service providers whose services we have added to our pages. These cookies are non-essential, but if you do not allow these cookies, then some, or all, of these services may not function properly. </p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0004"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Advertising Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0004" id="ot-group-id-C0004" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0004" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0004"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0004"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Advertising Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies may be set by us or our advertising partners. They allow us and our advertising partners to track responses to specific ad campaigns. These cookies may:  
1) be used to build a profile of your interests,
2) help us to associate an event or action on the website with an ad campaign that you interacted with,
3) be able to be attributed to personally identifiable information in our first-party data systems,
4) enable third parties to combine data collected with data collected by third parties or on other sites. 
 
They do not store personal information directly, but function by uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. </p></div></div></div></div><!-- Vendors / Hosts --><section id="ot-pc-lst" class="ot-hide ot-pc-scrollbar ot-enbl-chr"><div class="ot-lst-cntr ot-pc-scrollbar"><div id="ot-pc-hdr"><div id="ot-lst-title"><button class="ot-link-btn back-btn-handler" aria-label="Back"><svg id="ot-back-arw" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 444.531 444.531" xml:space="preserve"><title>Back Button</title><g><path fill="#656565" d="M213.13,222.409L351.88,83.653c7.05-7.043,10.567-15.657,10.567-25.841c0-10.183-3.518-18.793-10.567-25.835

<!-- End SchemaApp Code --><script>
    try {
      
// this tag manage cookies aimed at qualtrics form campaigns, it first check if the cookie exists under the name jhm_campaign_form. If the cookie exists, it returns its value, if it doesn't it will create it based on UTM Parameter variables created here in Piwik Pro

(function() {
    const campaignFormCookieName = "jhm_campaign_form"; // This line correctly assigns "jhm_campaign_form"
 
  // Function to get a cookie by name
  function getCookie(name) {
    const value = `; ${document.cookie}`;
    const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`);
    if (parts.length === 2) {
      return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
    }
    return null; // Return null if the cookie doesn't exist
  }
 
  // Function to create a cookie
  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    let expires = "";
    if (days) {
      const date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
      expires = "; expires=" + date.toUTCString();
    }
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
  }
 
  // Check if the cookie exists
  const existingCookie = getCookie(campaignFormCookieName);
 
  if (existingCookie) {
    // console.log(`Cookie exists: ${existingCookie}`);
    return existingCookie; // Return the cookie value
  } else {
    // Parse UTM parameters from the URL
    const utmSource = String('' || '');
    const utmMedium = String('' || '');
    const utmCampaign = String('' || '');

    // console.log("UTM Parameters:", { utmSource, utmMedium, utmCampaign });
 
    // Check if all relevant UTM parameters have non-empty string values
    if (utmSource !== "" && utmMedium !== "" && utmCampaign !== "") {
      const cookieValue = `${campaignFormCookieName}-${utmSource}-${utmMedium}-${utmCampaign}`;
      createCookie(campaignFormCookieName, cookieValue, 180); // Use the local variable
      // console.log(`Cookie created: ${cookieValue}`);
      return cookieValue; // Return the new cookie value
    } else {
      // console.log("UTM parameters are missing or incomplete. Cookie not created.");
      return null; // No cookie created
    }
  }
})();

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "UTM Cookie Creation" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script><script type="text/javascript">

       <script>
    try {
      
            let returnedFrom = undefined;

            let isTriggered = 0;

            function findExternalLinksWithBlankTarget() {
              
                const links = document.querySelectorAll('a[target="_blank"]');
                
                const externalLinks = [];

                links.forEach((link) => {

                    const url = new URL(link.href);
                    
                    externalLinks.push(url.href);
                    
                    if (link.href.includes("youtube")) {
                    
                        link.addEventListener("click", function () {
                    
                            returnedFrom = link.href;

                            if(returnedFrom) {
                                isTriggered = isTriggered + 1;
                            }
                    
                        });
                    }
                });

                return externalLinks;
            }

            // Usage
            const externalLinksExists = findExternalLinksWithBlankTarget();

            if (externalLinksExists.length > 0) {
                let categoryName = "Return to tab";

                let eventName = "Return from external link";

                let loc = window.location.href;
              
                // create an event for when the user leave the tab
                document.addEventListener("visibilitychange", function () {
                    if (
                        document.visibilityState === "visible" &&
                        returnedFrom &&
                        isTriggered < 2
                    ) {
                        isTriggered = 2
                        _paq.push([
                            "trackEvent",
                            categoryName,
                            eventName,
                            "Location: " +
                                loc +
                                " - Returned from: " +
                                returnedFrom,
                        ]);
                    }
                });
            }
        
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Return Visit" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script><script>
    try {
      

    const pageUrl = window.location.href.toLowerCase();

    function pageType() {
        const pathname = window.location.pathname.toLowerCase(); // uncomment this line for production

        // const pathname = "/video/"; // for testing purposes

        var pageType;

        if (pathname.includes("/video/")) {
            pageType = "Video";
        } else if (pathname.includes("/news/articles/")) {
            pageType = "Articles";
        } else if (pathname.includes("/news/newsroom/")) {
            pageType = "Newsroom";
        } else if (pathname.includes("/inhealth/")) {
            pageType = "InHealth";
        } else {
            pageType = undefined;
        }

        return pageType;
    }

    function SendViews(){

        const ccPageType = pageType();

        let pageTitle;

        let videoElement = document.querySelector("span.h3")?.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection");
        let videoTitle = document.querySelector("h1.main-content__title")?.textContent;
        
        let articleElement = document.querySelector("span.cta__title")?.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection");
        let articleTitle = document.querySelector("span.content-title")?.textContent;

        let newsroomElement = document.querySelector("span.cta__title")?.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection");
        let newsroomTitle = document.querySelector("h1.title-with-date__title")?.textContent;

        let inhealthElement = document.querySelector("span.cta__title")?.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection");
        let inhealthTitle = document.querySelector("h1.main-content__title")?.textContent;

        // some pages have varios elements using the same classes, so I need to loop through them to get the correct title
        document.querySelectorAll("span.cta__title").forEach((element) => {

            if(element.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection")) {

                articleElement = true;

                return;
            }
            
        });

        if(ccPageType !== undefined) {
            if(
                videoElement || 
                articleElement || 
                newsroomElement || 
                inhealthElement) {

                  // console.log("Is a Clinical Connections article...")
                  
                  _paq.push([
                      "trackEvent", // default piwik function
                      "Clinical Connection Views", // category
                      ccPageType, // action
                      "Location: " + pageUrl // I have here the page type (video, articles, newsroom, inhealth) followed by the url
                  ]);
                }
        }
    }

    SendViews();


    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Clinical Connection Views" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script><script type="text/javascript">
    try {
      
    (function () {
        /**
         * Finds the podcast title by checking various known HTML structures,
         * cascading from most-specific to most-general.
         * @param {HTMLElement} audioElement - The <audio> element that fired the event.
         * @returns {string} The found podcast title, or 'Unknown Title'.
         */
        function getPodcastTitle(audioElement) {
            var podcastTitle = "Unknown Title"; // Default value
            var tempElement = null;

            try {
                // Strategy 1: Schema.org meta tag (Used on podcasts.hopkinsmedicine.org)
                // This is the most reliable, so we try it first.
                var audioObjectDiv = audioElement.closest(
                    '[itemtype="http://schema.org/AudioObject"]'
                );
                if (audioObjectDiv) {
                    tempElement = audioObjectDiv.querySelector(
                        'meta[itemprop="name"]'
                    );
                    if (
                        tempElement &&
                        tempElement.getAttribute("content")
                    ) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement
                            .getAttribute("content")
                            .trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Strategy 2: .content-block__item-description (Used on .../gim/podcast/episodes)
                var contentBlock = audioElement.closest(
                    ".content-block__item-description"
                );
                if (contentBlock) {
                    tempElement = contentBlock.querySelector(
                        "h3.content-block__item-title"
                    );
                    if (tempElement && tempElement.textContent) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement.textContent.trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Strategy 3: .rtf wrapper (Used on .../office-of-well-being/podcast & .../psychiatry/research/memori-corps)
                var rtfContainer = audioElement.closest(".rtf");
                if (rtfContainer) {
                    tempElement = rtfContainer.querySelector("h3"); // Get first h3 in this section
                    if (tempElement && tempElement.textContent) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement.textContent.trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Strategy 4: .accordion-module wrapper (Used on .../psychiatry/specialty-areas/mindfulness)
                var accordionHeader = audioElement.closest(
                    ".accordion-module-header"
                );
                if (accordionHeader) {
                    tempElement = accordionHeader.querySelector("h3");
                    if (tempElement && tempElement.textContent) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement.textContent.trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Strategy 5: Main Article H1 (For "Web Extra" on .../smart-stethoscope-zeros-in-on-lung-sounds)
                // If the audio is in the right rail, the title is the main page H1.
                if (
                    audioElement.closest(
                        ".news-article-right-rail__web-extra-callout"
                    )
                ) {
                    tempElement = document.querySelector(".news-article-right-rail__title"); // Get main page title
                    if (tempElement && tempElement.textContent) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement.textContent.trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Fallback: document.title (Catch-all for any other cases)
                // This will grab "Smart Stethoscope..." for Case 5 if the H1 fails
                if (document.title) {
                    podcastTitle = document.title.split("|")[0].trim(); // Clean up "Title | Johns Hopkins"
                    if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                }
              
            } catch (e) {
                // If any DOM query fails, log it and proceed with 'Unknown Title'
                if (
                    window.console &&
                    typeof window.console.error === "function"
                ) {
                    console.error("Piwik Podcast Tracker Error:", e);
                }
            }

            // Return 'Unknown Title' if all else failed
            return podcastTitle;
        }

        /**
         * Handles 'play' and 'pause' events from any audio element on the page.
         * @param {Event} event - The 'play' or 'pause' event.
         */
        function handlePodcastEvent(event) {
            var target = event.target;
            var isHopkinsAudioPlayer = false;

            // 1. Check if the event came from a relevant <audio> tag
            if (target.tagName === "AUDIO") {
                // Check if it's a powerpress player OR a hopkins-hosted audio file
                if (target.closest(".powerpress_player")) {
                    isHopkinsAudioPlayer = true;
                } else if (
                    target.src &&
                    (target.src.includes("amazonaws.com") ||
                        target.src.includes("hopkinsmedicine.org"))
                ) {
                    isHopkinsAudioPlayer = true;
                }
            }

            if (isHopkinsAudioPlayer) {
                // 2. Get the podcast title using the new robust function
                var podcastTitle = getPodcastTitle(target);

                console.log("Podcast title: ", podcastTitle);

                // 3. Get the current page URL
                var pageUrl = window.location.href;

                console.log("Page URL: ", pageUrl);

                // 4. Determine the action (Capitalize 'play' -> 'Play' or 'pause' -> 'Pause')
                var eventAction =
                    event.type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() +
                    event.type.slice(1);

                console.log("Event Action: ", eventAction);

                // 5. Construct the Piwik PRO event name
                var eventName = podcastTitle + " - " + pageUrl;

                console.log("Event Name: ", eventName);

                // 6. Send the event to Piwik PRO
                if (window._paq) {
                    window._paq.push([
                        "trackEvent",
                        "Podcast Interaction",
                        eventAction,
                        eventName,
                    ]);
                }
            }
        }

        // 7. Add listeners to the document for 'play' and 'pause'
        // We use the 'capture' phase (true) as it's more reliable for media events
        document.addEventListener("play", handlePodcastEvent, true);
        document.addEventListener("pause", handlePodcastEvent, true);
    })();

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Podcasts Audio Play Pause Tracking" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script><script>
    try {
      
  if (document.querySelector("#avaamo-open-button") != null) {
	var nL = document.createElement("a"),
	sW = document.querySelector("div.skip-wrapper");
	nL.setAttribute("href", "#avaamo-open-button");
	nL.innerText = "Skip to Johns Hopkins Medicine Virtual Assistant";
	sW.insertBefore(nL, sW.querySelector("a"));
}

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Avaamo Chatbot Skip To Content" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script></body></html>

#onetrust-banner-sdk
{
    padding: 1rem;
	margin: .2rem !important;
}

/* Adding padding to the preferences heading to center it*/
h2#ot-pc-title{
	padding: 1rem 0 !important;
}

/* 
	IMAGES STYLES START
*/
/* Adjusting the logo to align with description */
div#onetrust-banner-sdk.ot-bnr-w-logo img.ot-bnr-logo
{
    position: absolute;
    top: 50px !important;
    transform: translate(-5%);
    left: 0px;
	width: 50px !important;
    height: 50px !important;
    margin: .5rem
}
/* Hiding OneTrust logos from banner and preference modal */
div.ot-pc-footer-logo, div.ot-pc-logo
{
    display: none !important;
    visibility: hidden !important;
    width: 0 !important;
    height: 0 !important;
}
/*
	IMAGES STYLES END
*/

/*
	TITLE AND DESCRIPTION STYLES START
*/
/* Adding color to the banner title above description */
h2#onetrust-policy-title
{
    color: #002c77 !important
}
/* Adjusting padding to banner description */
div#onetrust-policy-text
{
    font-size: 14px !important
}
/* Adjusnto margin left to title and description */
#onetrust-policy-text, #onetrust-policy-title  
{
    margin-left: .5rem !important;
}
/*
	TITLE AND DESCRIPTION STYLES END
*/

/* 
	BUTTONS AND LINKS STYLES START
*/
/* Banner link style */
#onetrust-policy-text a.ot-cookie-policy-link
{
    margin-left: 0.25rem !important;
    text-decoration: underline !important;
}
/* Adding underline to links default style */
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler.cookie-setting-link, a.privacy-notice-link
{
   text-decoration: underline !important;
}
/* Adjunsting links hover style */
div#onetrust-policy-text a:hover, a.privacy-notice-link:hover, #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler.cookie-setting-link:hover 
{
    text-decoration: none !important;
    color: #006dc7 !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
}
/* Adjusting buttons hover style */
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-accept-btn-handler:hover, #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-reject-all-handler:hover, #accept-recommended-btn-handler:hover, button.save-preference-btn-handler:hover
{
    background-color: #002c77 !important;
    text-decoration: underline !important;
    opacity: 1 !important
}
/* Removing opacity from buttons on hover */
#onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-sdk-button:hover, #onetrust-banner-sdk :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):hover, #onetrust-banner-sdk :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):focus, #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-sdk-button:hover, #onetrust-pc-sdk :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):hover, #onetrust-pc-sdk :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):focus, #ot-sdk-cookie-policy .ot-sdk-button:hover, #ot-sdk-cookie-policy :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):hover, #ot-sdk-cookie-policy :not(.ot-leg-btn-container)>button:not(.ot-link-btn):focus
{
   opacity: 1 !important
}
/* Buttons focus style adding outline offset for the preferences modal and banner to be more visible */
/* Preference center tabs focus */
div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk *:focus{
	outline-offset: -2px !important;
	outline: 2px solid #002c77 !important;
}
div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-vlst-cntr > a:focus, div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk a.privacy-notice-link:focus, div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk button.save-preference-btn-handler:focus, div#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk button#accept-recommended-btn-handler:focus
{
	outline: 2px solid #002c77 !important;		
	outline-offset: 1px !important;
}
#onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-banner-sdk *:focus, #onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-banner-sdk:focus
{
	outline-width: 2px !important;
}

/* 
	TOGGLES STYLES START
*/

div#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-chkbox input, #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-tgl input
{
	width: 1px !important;
	height: 1px !important;

class="ot-tab-desc ot-sdk-eight ot-sdk-columns"><div class="ot-desc-cntr" id="ot-tab-desc" tabindex="0" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="ot-pvcy-hdr"><h4 id="ot-pvcy-hdr">Your Privacy</h4><p id="ot-pc-desc" class="ot-grp-desc">When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, primarily in the form of cookies. This information might pertain to you, your preferences, or your device and is generally used to ensure the site functions as expected. While this information typically does not identify you directly, it can provide a more personalized web experience. 

We respect your right to privacy. Therefore, you have the option to not allow certain types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to learn more and adjust our default settings. Please note, however, that blocking some types of cookies may affect your site experience and the services we can offer. 
            <br><a href="https://it.johnshopkins.edu/policies-privacystatement/" class="privacy-notice-link" rel="noopener" target="_blank" aria-label="Privacy Statement, opens in a new tab">Privacy Statement</a></p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0001"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Strictly Necessary Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. This category may contain some cookie types that are unable to be removed from our application.</p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0002"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Website Traffic Measurement</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0002" id="ot-group-id-C0002" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0002" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0002"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0002"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Website Traffic Measurement</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. These cookies may also allow us to determine how you arrived at our site. These cookies are non-essential, but without these cookies our ability to monitor site performance is impacted. </p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0003"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Functional/Performance Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0003" id="ot-group-id-C0003" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0003" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0003"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0003"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Functional/Performance Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies enable our website to provide enhanced functionality and performance. They may remember choices you make, such as language preferences or region selection, and provide more tailored features. These cookies may be set by us or third-party service providers whose services we have added to our pages. These cookies are non-essential, but if you do not allow these cookies, then some, or all, of these services may not function properly. </p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0004"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Advertising Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0004" id="ot-group-id-C0004" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0004" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0004"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0004"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Advertising Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies may be set by us or our advertising partners. They allow us and our advertising partners to track responses to specific ad campaigns. These cookies may:  
1) be used to build a profile of your interests,
2) help us to associate an event or action on the website with an ad campaign that you interacted with,
3) be able to be attributed to personally identifiable information in our first-party data systems,
4) enable third parties to combine data collected with data collected by third parties or on other sites. 
 
They do not store personal information directly, but function by uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. </p></div></div></div></div><!-- Vendors / Hosts --><section id="ot-pc-lst" class="ot-hide ot-pc-scrollbar ot-enbl-chr"><div class="ot-lst-cntr ot-pc-scrollbar"><div id="ot-pc-hdr"><div id="ot-lst-title"><button class="ot-link-btn back-btn-handler" aria-label="Back"><svg id="ot-back-arw" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 444.531 444.531" xml:space="preserve"><title>Back Button</title><g><path fill="#656565" d="M213.13,222.409L351.88,83.653c7.05-7.043,10.567-15.657,10.567-25.841c0-10.183-3.518-18.793-10.567-25.835

      function checkGroupPresence(group){

    }
    
    // Fetch consent types user never gave a decision
    (function getNewConsentTypes() {
        ppms.cm.api('getNewComplianceTypes', function(newConsents){checkNewConsentTypes(newConsents);}, console.error);

    function returnOneTrustActiveGroupsLen() {
        return ',C0001,'.length;
    }
    
    // If there are any new (not decided) consent types
    function checkNewConsentTypes(newConsents){
        if (newConsents.length > 0) {
          window.PPCM_initial_compliance_settings = true;
          //window.PPCM_all_consents_given = true;
          //window.PPCM_new_consent_types = newConsents;
          var settings = {consents: newConsents}
          _paq.push(["setUserIsAnonymous", 1]);
          ppms.cm.api('setInitialComplianceSettings', settings, function(){ console.log("PPMS Privacy Cookie has been set"); }, function(){ console.log("Error setting PPMS Privacy Cookie"); });
        } 
          //window.PPCM_all_consents_given = false;
          if(!undefined) {
            window.PPCM_initial_compliance_settings = true;
          } 
          else {
            window.PPCM_initial_compliance_settings = false;
          }
        
    }
    // PPCM The rest of the available consent types marked as false as not in usage currently
    var consentTypesSettings = {
       analytics: checkGroupPresence("C0003"),
       ab_testing_and_personalization: checkGroupPresence("C0002"),
       conversion_tracking: checkGroupPresence("C0004"),
       marketing_automation: checkGroupPresence("C0004"),
       remarketing: checkGroupPresence("C0004"),
       //user_feedback: false,
       //custom_type: false
    }
      
    var complianceSettings = {
      consents: {
        analytics: { status: consentTypesSettings.analytics },
        ab_testing_and_personalization: { status: consentTypesSettings.ab_testing_and_personalization },
        conversion_tracking: { status: consentTypesSettings.conversion_tracking},
        marketing_automation: { status: consentTypesSettings.marketing_automation },
        remarketing: { status: consentTypesSettings.remarketing }
      }
    }

    window.PPCM_consents_changed = 0;

    ppms.cm.api('getComplianceSettings', function(settings){
      if(settings.consents !== undefined && !window.PPCM_initial_compliance_settings ){
        if(settings.consents.analytics === undefined || settings.consents.analytics.status !== checkGroupPresence("C0003")) {
          window.PPCM_consents_changed = 1;
        }
         if(settings.consents.ab_testing_and_personalization === undefined || settings.consents.ab_testing_and_personalization.status !== checkGroupPresence("C0002")) {
          window.PPCM_consents_changed = 1;
        } 
         if(settings.consents.conversion_tracking === undefined || settings.consents.conversion_tracking.status !== checkGroupPresence("C0004")) {
          window.PPCM_consents_changed = 1;
        } 
         if(settings.consents.marketing_automation === undefined || settings.consents.marketing_automation.status !== checkGroupPresence("C0004")) {
          window.PPCM_consents_changed = 1;
        } 
         if(settings.consents.remarketing === undefined || settings.consents.remarketing.status !== checkGroupPresence("C0004")) {
          window.PPCM_consents_changed = 1;
        } 
      } 
    },function(){ /*errorMsg("Getting compliance PPCM settings")*/ });

    if(window.PPCM_consents_changed === 1){
      if(complianceSettings.consents.analytics.status === 1){
        _paq.push(["deanonymizeUser"]);
        _paq.push(["enableCookies"]);
      }
      else {
        _paq.push(["setUserIsAnonymous", true]);
        _paq.push(["disableCookies"]);

      ppms.cm.api('setComplianceSettings', complianceSettings, function(){ /*successMsg("Consents Types")*/ }, function(){ /*errorMsg("Consents Types")*/ });
    }

<!-- End SchemaApp Code --><script>
    try {
      
// this tag manage cookies aimed at qualtrics form campaigns, it first check if the cookie exists under the name jhm_campaign_form. If the cookie exists, it returns its value, if it doesn't it will create it based on UTM Parameter variables created here in Piwik Pro

(function() {
    const campaignFormCookieName = "jhm_campaign_form"; // This line correctly assigns "jhm_campaign_form"
 
  // Function to get a cookie by name
  function getCookie(name) {
    const value = `; ${document.cookie}`;
    const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`);
    if (parts.length === 2) {
      return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
    }
    return null; // Return null if the cookie doesn't exist
  }
 
  // Function to create a cookie
  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    let expires = "";
    if (days) {
      const date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
      expires = "; expires=" + date.toUTCString();
    }
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
  }
 
  // Check if the cookie exists
  const existingCookie = getCookie(campaignFormCookieName);
 
  if (existingCookie) {
    // console.log(`Cookie exists: ${existingCookie}`);
    return existingCookie; // Return the cookie value
  } else {
    // Parse UTM parameters from the URL
    const utmSource = String('' || '');
    const utmMedium = String('' || '');
    const utmCampaign = String('' || '');

    // console.log("UTM Parameters:", { utmSource, utmMedium, utmCampaign });
 
    // Check if all relevant UTM parameters have non-empty string values
    if (utmSource !== "" && utmMedium !== "" && utmCampaign !== "") {
      const cookieValue = `${campaignFormCookieName}-${utmSource}-${utmMedium}-${utmCampaign}`;
      createCookie(campaignFormCookieName, cookieValue, 180); // Use the local variable
      // console.log(`Cookie created: ${cookieValue}`);
      return cookieValue; // Return the new cookie value
    } else {
      // console.log("UTM parameters are missing or incomplete. Cookie not created.");
      return null; // No cookie created
    }
  }
})();

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "UTM Cookie Creation" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script><script type="text/javascript">
    try {
      
    var _paq = _paq || [];
    (function () {
        var trackAnonymously = (function() { return window.sevenTag.getVariableValue('Piwik PRO Anonymization', 11) })()('analytics');
        if (trackAnonymously) {
            _paq.push(['setUserIsAnonymous', 1]);
            _paq.push(['disableCookies']);
        }
    }());

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Piwik PRO" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    try {
      
    var _paq = _paq || [];
    _paq.push(['setTrackingSource', 'jstc_tm']);
    _paq.push(['setSessionIdStrictPrivacyMode', true]);
    _paq.push(['enableLinkTracking']);
    _paq.push(['setIpTracking', true]);
    _paq.push(['setDomains', ['www.hopkinsmedicine.org/', 'scical.hopkinsmedicine.org/', 'events.hopkinsmedicine.org/', 'profiles.hopkinsmedicine.org/', 'brand.hopkinsmedicine.org/', 'jh.qualtrics.com/', 'jhutest.qualtrics.com/', 'auth-scv10.hopkinsmedicine.org/', 'anesthesiology.hopkinsmedicine.org/', 'www.hopkinsmedicine.org/research/profiles', 'www.hopkinsmedicine.org/research/profiles/', 'podcasts.hopkinsmedicine.org/']]);
    _paq.push(['trackPageView']);
    (function(p,i,w,ik) {
        var g=ik.createElement('script'),s=ik.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        _paq.push(['setTrackerUrl', p]);
        _paq.push(['setSiteId', w]);
        g.type='text/javascript';g.async=true;g.defer=true;g.src=i;s.parentNode.insertBefore(g,s);
    })('https://jhm.piwik.pro/ppms.php','https://jhm.containers.piwik.pro/ppms.js','fd716230\u002D1d9c\u002D4254\u002D9880\u002Db5715cd3995a',document)

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Piwik PRO" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script>
       <script>
    try {
      
            let returnedFrom = undefined;

            let isTriggered = 0;

            function findExternalLinksWithBlankTarget() {
              
                const links = document.querySelectorAll('a[target="_blank"]');
                
                const externalLinks = [];

                links.forEach((link) => {

                    const url = new URL(link.href);
                    
                    externalLinks.push(url.href);
                    
                    if (link.href.includes("youtube")) {
                    
                        link.addEventListener("click", function () {
                    
                            returnedFrom = link.href;

                            if(returnedFrom) {
                                isTriggered = isTriggered + 1;
                            }
                    
                        });
                    }
                });

                return externalLinks;
            }

            // Usage
            const externalLinksExists = findExternalLinksWithBlankTarget();

            if (externalLinksExists.length > 0) {
                let categoryName = "Return to tab";

                let eventName = "Return from external link";

                let loc = window.location.href;
              
                // create an event for when the user leave the tab
                document.addEventListener("visibilitychange", function () {
                    if (
                        document.visibilityState === "visible" &&
                        returnedFrom &&
                        isTriggered < 2
                    ) {
                        isTriggered = 2
                        _paq.push([
                            "trackEvent",
                            categoryName,
                            eventName,
                            "Location: " +
                                loc +
                                " - Returned from: " +
                                returnedFrom,
                        ]);
                    }
                });
            }
        
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Return Visit" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script><script>
    try {
      

    const pageUrl = window.location.href.toLowerCase();

    function pageType() {
        const pathname = window.location.pathname.toLowerCase(); // uncomment this line for production

        // const pathname = "/video/"; // for testing purposes

        var pageType;

        if (pathname.includes("/video/")) {
            pageType = "Video";
        } else if (pathname.includes("/news/articles/")) {
            pageType = "Articles";
        } else if (pathname.includes("/news/newsroom/")) {
            pageType = "Newsroom";
        } else if (pathname.includes("/inhealth/")) {
            pageType = "InHealth";
        } else {
            pageType = undefined;
        }

        return pageType;
    }

    function SendViews(){

        const ccPageType = pageType();

        let pageTitle;

        let videoElement = document.querySelector("span.h3")?.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection");
        let videoTitle = document.querySelector("h1.main-content__title")?.textContent;
        
        let articleElement = document.querySelector("span.cta__title")?.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection");
        let articleTitle = document.querySelector("span.content-title")?.textContent;

        let newsroomElement = document.querySelector("span.cta__title")?.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection");
        let newsroomTitle = document.querySelector("h1.title-with-date__title")?.textContent;

        let inhealthElement = document.querySelector("span.cta__title")?.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection");
        let inhealthTitle = document.querySelector("h1.main-content__title")?.textContent;

        // some pages have varios elements using the same classes, so I need to loop through them to get the correct title
        document.querySelectorAll("span.cta__title").forEach((element) => {

            if(element.textContent.includes("Clinical Connection")) {

                articleElement = true;

                return;
            }
            
        });

        if(ccPageType !== undefined) {
            if(
                videoElement || 
                articleElement || 
                newsroomElement || 
                inhealthElement) {

                  // console.log("Is a Clinical Connections article...")
                  
                  _paq.push([
                      "trackEvent", // default piwik function
                      "Clinical Connection Views", // category
                      ccPageType, // action
                      "Location: " + pageUrl // I have here the page type (video, articles, newsroom, inhealth) followed by the url
                  ]);
                }
        }
    }

    SendViews();


    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Clinical Connection Views" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script><script type="text/javascript">
    try {
      
    (function () {
        /**
         * Finds the podcast title by checking various known HTML structures,
         * cascading from most-specific to most-general.
         * @param {HTMLElement} audioElement - The <audio> element that fired the event.
         * @returns {string} The found podcast title, or 'Unknown Title'.
         */
        function getPodcastTitle(audioElement) {
            var podcastTitle = "Unknown Title"; // Default value
            var tempElement = null;

            try {
                // Strategy 1: Schema.org meta tag (Used on podcasts.hopkinsmedicine.org)
                // This is the most reliable, so we try it first.
                var audioObjectDiv = audioElement.closest(
                    '[itemtype="http://schema.org/AudioObject"]'
                );
                if (audioObjectDiv) {
                    tempElement = audioObjectDiv.querySelector(
                        'meta[itemprop="name"]'
                    );
                    if (
                        tempElement &&
                        tempElement.getAttribute("content")
                    ) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement
                            .getAttribute("content")
                            .trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Strategy 2: .content-block__item-description (Used on .../gim/podcast/episodes)
                var contentBlock = audioElement.closest(
                    ".content-block__item-description"
                );
                if (contentBlock) {
                    tempElement = contentBlock.querySelector(
                        "h3.content-block__item-title"
                    );
                    if (tempElement && tempElement.textContent) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement.textContent.trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Strategy 3: .rtf wrapper (Used on .../office-of-well-being/podcast & .../psychiatry/research/memori-corps)
                var rtfContainer = audioElement.closest(".rtf");
                if (rtfContainer) {
                    tempElement = rtfContainer.querySelector("h3"); // Get first h3 in this section
                    if (tempElement && tempElement.textContent) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement.textContent.trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Strategy 4: .accordion-module wrapper (Used on .../psychiatry/specialty-areas/mindfulness)
                var accordionHeader = audioElement.closest(
                    ".accordion-module-header"
                );
                if (accordionHeader) {
                    tempElement = accordionHeader.querySelector("h3");
                    if (tempElement && tempElement.textContent) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement.textContent.trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Strategy 5: Main Article H1 (For "Web Extra" on .../smart-stethoscope-zeros-in-on-lung-sounds)
                // If the audio is in the right rail, the title is the main page H1.
                if (
                    audioElement.closest(
                        ".news-article-right-rail__web-extra-callout"
                    )
                ) {
                    tempElement = document.querySelector(".news-article-right-rail__title"); // Get main page title
                    if (tempElement && tempElement.textContent) {
                        podcastTitle = tempElement.textContent.trim();
                        if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                    }
                }

                // Fallback: document.title (Catch-all for any other cases)
                // This will grab "Smart Stethoscope..." for Case 5 if the H1 fails
                if (document.title) {
                    podcastTitle = document.title.split("|")[0].trim(); // Clean up "Title | Johns Hopkins"
                    if (podcastTitle) return podcastTitle;
                }
              
            } catch (e) {
                // If any DOM query fails, log it and proceed with 'Unknown Title'
                if (
                    window.console &&
                    typeof window.console.error === "function"
                ) {
                    console.error("Piwik Podcast Tracker Error:", e);
                }
            }

            // Return 'Unknown Title' if all else failed
            return podcastTitle;
        }

        /**
         * Handles 'play' and 'pause' events from any audio element on the page.
         * @param {Event} event - The 'play' or 'pause' event.
         */
        function handlePodcastEvent(event) {
            var target = event.target;
            var isHopkinsAudioPlayer = false;

            // 1. Check if the event came from a relevant <audio> tag
            if (target.tagName === "AUDIO") {
                // Check if it's a powerpress player OR a hopkins-hosted audio file
                if (target.closest(".powerpress_player")) {
                    isHopkinsAudioPlayer = true;
                } else if (
                    target.src &&
                    (target.src.includes("amazonaws.com") ||
                        target.src.includes("hopkinsmedicine.org"))
                ) {
                    isHopkinsAudioPlayer = true;
                }
            }

            if (isHopkinsAudioPlayer) {
                // 2. Get the podcast title using the new robust function
                var podcastTitle = getPodcastTitle(target);

                console.log("Podcast title: ", podcastTitle);

                // 3. Get the current page URL
                var pageUrl = window.location.href;

                console.log("Page URL: ", pageUrl);

                // 4. Determine the action (Capitalize 'play' -> 'Play' or 'pause' -> 'Pause')
                var eventAction =
                    event.type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() +
                    event.type.slice(1);

                console.log("Event Action: ", eventAction);

                // 5. Construct the Piwik PRO event name
                var eventName = podcastTitle + " - " + pageUrl;

                console.log("Event Name: ", eventName);

                // 6. Send the event to Piwik PRO
                if (window._paq) {
                    window._paq.push([
                        "trackEvent",
                        "Podcast Interaction",
                        eventAction,
                        eventName,
                    ]);
                }
            }
        }

        // 7. Add listeners to the document for 'play' and 'pause'
        // We use the 'capture' phase (true) as it's more reliable for media events
        document.addEventListener("play", handlePodcastEvent, true);
        document.addEventListener("pause", handlePodcastEvent, true);
    })();

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Podcasts Audio Play Pause Tracking" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script><script>
    try {
      
  if (document.querySelector("#avaamo-open-button") != null) {
	var nL = document.createElement("a"),
	sW = document.querySelector("div.skip-wrapper");
	nL.setAttribute("href", "#avaamo-open-button");
	nL.innerText = "Skip to Johns Hopkins Medicine Virtual Assistant";
	sW.insertBefore(nL, sW.querySelector("a"));
}

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Failed to evaluate tag - ' + "Avaamo Chatbot Skip To Content" + ': ' + error.message)      
    }</script></body></html>

headings.text: Important Information for Patients with UnitedHealthcare

paragraphs: As of August 25, 2025, all providers and facilities that are part of Johns Hopkins Medicine, EXCEPT FOR Johns Hopkins All Childrens Hospital in Florida, are considered out of network by UnitedHealthcare.
Johns Hopkins Childrens Centerand Johns Hopkins All Childrens Hospital are ranked #1 in their respective states on U.S. News & World Reports 202526 Best Childrens Hospitals list.
Three Johns Hopkins member hospitals  The Johns Hopkins Hospital, Sibley Memorial Hospital and Suburban Hospital  were recognized in U.S. News & World Reports 202526 Best Hospitals list.
The Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine consistently ranks among the nations very best in education. Learn more about our programs and how to apply.
Research is the foundation of Johns Hopkins Medicine, yielding new insights and better treatment. Learn more about our labs, research faculty and clinical trials.

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, primarily in the form of cookies. This information might pertain to you, your preferences, or your device and is generally used to ensure the site functions as expected. While this information typically does not identify you directly, it can provide a more personalized web experience. 

We respect your right to privacy. Therefore, you have the option to not allow certain types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to learn more and adjust our default settings. Please note, however, that blocking some types of cookies may affect your site experience and the services we can offer. 
            Privacy Statement

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. This category may contain some cookie types that are unable to be removed from our application.

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. These cookies may also allow us to determine how you arrived at our site. These cookies are non-essential, but without these cookies our ability to monitor site performance is impacted.

These cookies enable our website to provide enhanced functionality and performance. They may remember choices you make, such as language preferences or region selection, and provide more tailored features. These cookies may be set by us or third-party service providers whose services we have added to our pages. These cookies are non-essential, but if you do not allow these cookies, then some, or all, of these services may not function properly.

These cookies may be set by us or our advertising partners. They allow us and our advertising partners to track responses to specific ad campaigns. These cookies may:  
1) be used to build a profile of your interests,
2) help us to associate an event or action on the website with an ad campaign that you interacted with,
3) be able to be attributed to personally identifiable information in our first-party data systems,
4) enable third parties to combine data collected with data collected by third parties or on other sites. 
 
They do not store personal information directly, but function by uniquely identifying your browser and internet device.
